item.title: MIUI OS3.0.45.0.WPBCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 17 Pro Max China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 17 Pro Max China

Codename: popsicle

Version: OS3.0.45.0.WPBCNXM | 16.0

Size: 11.9 GB

MD5: 6200f9beae5d84dd6c9d4a2f8f21105c

Changelog:
[Camera]
New: Smart scene cards now support rear camera photo and video, with major improvements for scenes like fireworks and stage performances. Video mode also supports turning on LOFIC manually.
New: Rear display video now supports full frame recording for a more immersive video selfie experience
New: Now you can capture live moments while recording without stopping the video
New: Pro video (LOG) now supports more LUTs, and the on-screen preview looks more vivid and true to life while you shoot
New: Now you can customize the top panel and menu layout to match your habits and improve Camera efficiency
New: Dual video: record with the front and rear cameras at the same time for more creative shooting options
Optimization: Shooting results for slow motion and night videos, and corrected distortion in ultra wide shots
